item.title: Network Protocols
item.author: sohasoham811@gmail.com (Soham Tripathy)
item.description: Jan-May 2023 | This repository contains my work on various computer network projects and implementations. The projects are written in Python and C++. The projects are as follows: Udp Client/Server Echo Server TCP Client/Server Chat Communication DNS Server Implementation CCITT CRC-8 Implementation GBN Routing protocol Implementation OSPF Routing protocol Implementation Python socket programming C++ socket programming
